description:
Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Using this knowledge, she sets a trap on a plane where the Three Lights are holding an in-flight event in order to get Usagi’s attention.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Invitación al terror. El vuelo nocturno de Bunny.
Invitation to Terror: Usagi`s Night Flight
Kyoufu e no Shoutai! Usagi no Yakan Hikou
恐怖への招待うさぎの夜間飛行
